languages.text: Цвет маршрута сигнализирует о том, насколько безопасен тот или иной путь. -Зеленые маршруты полностью безопасны. -Желтые маршруты сообщают о том, что во время путешествия на корабле могут произойти непредсказуемые события. -Оранжевые маршруты сигнализируют о высокой вероятности нападения на корабль (даже в варпе!) -Красные маршруты предупреждают, что при движении по ним на корабль непременно нападут. Навигатор может обезопасить маршрут, расходуя очки {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Интуиции навигатора{/g} — их можно получить за обнаружение и сканирование новых систем на глобальной карте {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}.

A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цвет маршрута сигнализирует о том, насколько безопасен тот или иной путь. -Зеленые маршруты полностью безопасны. -Желтые маршруты сообщают о том, что во время путешествия на корабле могут произойти непредсказуемые события. -Оранжевые маршруты сигнализируют о высокой вероятности нападения на корабль (даже в варпе!) -Красные маршруты предупреждают, что при движении по ним на корабль непременно нападут. Навигатор может обезопасить маршрут, расходуя очки {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Интуиции навигатора{/g} — их можно получить за обнаружение и сканирование новых систем на глобальной карте {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}.

traits.locale_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. - Green routes are as safe as warp routes can be. - Yellow routes are a signal that events beyond anyone's prediction can occur during the jump. - Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! - Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of Navigator's insight, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems on the map of the Koronus Expanse.

A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. - Green routes are as safe as warp routes can be. - Yellow routes are a signal that events beyond anyone's prediction can occur during the jump. - Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! - Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of Navigator's insight, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems on the map of the Koronus Expanse.

A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. - Green routes are the absolute safest. - Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. - Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! - Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of Navigator's insight, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the Koronus Expanse.

A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

languages.text: El color de una ruta indica su nivel de peligro. -Las rutas verdes son absolutamente seguras. -Las rutas amarillas indican que puede suceder algo impredecible durante el salto. -Las rutas naranjas indican una gran probabilidad de que la nave sufra un ataque ¡incluso en la disformidad! -Las rutas rojas indican que hay garantizado un ataque enemigo durante el trayecto. El navegante de tu nave puede hacer que una ruta sea más segura al gastar puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Intuición de navegante{/g}, que puedes obtener descubriendo y escaneando nuevos sistemas por toda la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}.
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El color de una ruta indica su nivel de peligro. - Las rutas verdes son absolutamente seguras. - Las rutas amarillas indican que puede suceder algo impredecible durante el salto. - Las rutas naranjas indican una gran probabilidad de que la nave sufra un ataque ¡incluso en la disformidad! - Las rutas rojas indican que hay garantizado un ataque enemigo durante el trayecto. El navegante de tu nave puede hacer que una ruta sea más segura al gastar puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Intuición de {/g}navegante, que puedes obtener descubriendo y escaneando nuevos sistemas por toda la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: 航路の色はその危険度を示している。 - 緑の航路は非常に安全。 - 黄色の航路では、ジャンプ中に予測不能の出来事が起こる可能性がある。 - オレンジの航路は<歪み>の中にいたとしても、攻撃を受ける確率が高い。 - 赤の航路は、移動中に確実に敵対勢力から攻撃を受ける。 船の航宙士は、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}中の新しい星系を発見し、スキャンすることで得られる{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}航宙士の洞察力{/g}ポイントを消費すると、航路をより安全に行うことができる。
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 航路の色はその危険度を示している。 - 緑の航路は非常に安全。 - 黄色の航路では、ジャンプ中に予測不能の出来事が起こる可能性がある。 - オレンジの航路は<歪み>の中にいたとしても、攻撃を受ける確率が高い。 - 赤の航路は、移動中に確実に敵対勢力から攻撃を受ける。 船の航宙士は、コロヌス・エクスパンス中の新しい星系を発見し、スキャンすることで得られる航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察力{/g}ポイントを消費すると、航路をより安全に行うことができる。

languages.text: 航线的颜色代表危险程度。 - 绿色航线代表绝对安全。 - 黄色航线代表亚空间航行过程中可能会遭遇不可预知的事件。 - 橙色航线代表舰船极有可能在亚空间中遭到攻击。 - 红色航线代表舰船在航行过程中必定会遭到敌对势力的攻击。 舰船的导航者可以通过消耗{g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}导航者洞察{/g}，来提高航线的安全性。您可以通过扫描整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的新星系，获得额外导航者洞察。
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 航线的颜色代表危险程度。 - 绿色航线代表绝对安全。 - 黄色航线代表亚空间航行过程中可能会遭遇不可预知的事件。 - 橙色航线代表舰船极有可能在亚空间中遭到攻击。 - 红色航线表示舰船在航行过程中，必定会遭到敌对势力的攻击。 舰船的导航者可以通过消耗{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}导航者洞察{/g}，来提高航线的安全性。您可以通过扫描整个科罗努斯扩区的新星系，获得额外导航者洞察。

languages.text: Die Farbe einer Route ist ein Hinweis auf ihre Gefahrenstufe. -Grüne Routen sind die absolut sichersten. -Gelbe Routen signalisieren, dass während des Sprungs unvorhersehbare Ereignisse eintreten können. -Orange Routen zeigen an, dass das Schiff mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit angegriffen wird – sogar im Warp! -Rote Routen sind ein sicheres Zeichen dafür, dass das Schiff während der Reise von feindlichen Kräften angegriffen werden wird. Der Navigator des Schiffes kann eine Route sicherer machen, indem er Punkte für die {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Einsicht{/g} des Navigators einsetzt, die durch das Entdecken und Scannen neuer Systeme in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erhalten werden können.
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Farbe einer Route ist ein Hinweis auf ihre Gefahrenstufe. - Grüne Routen sind die absolut sichersten. - Gelbe Routen signalisieren, dass während des Sprungs unvorhersehbare Ereignisse eintreten können. - Orange Routen zeigen an, dass das Schiff mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit angegriffen wird – sogar im Warp! - Rote Routen sind ein sicheres Zeichen dafür, dass das Schiff während der Reise von feindlichen Kräften angegriffen werden wird. Der Navigator des Schiffes kann eine Route sicherer machen, indem er Punkte für die {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Einsicht{/g} des Navigators einsetzt, die durch das Entdecken und Scannen neuer Systeme in der Koronus-Ausdehnung erhalten werden können.

languages.text: La couleur d'un itinéraire indique son niveau de dangerosité. -Les itinéraires verts sont les plus sûrs. -Les itinéraires jaunes indiquent que des événements imprévisibles peuvent se produire lors du saut. -Les routes orange indiquent une forte probabilité que le vaisseau soit attaqué, même dans le Warp ! -Les itinéraires rouges indiquent que le vaisseau sera à coup sûr attaqué par des forces hostiles lors du trajet. Le navigateur du vaisseau peut sécuriser un itinéraire moyennant des points de {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}perspicacité{/g}, qui peuvent être acquis en découvrant et en analysant de nouveaux systèmes dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}.
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La couleur d'un itinéraire indique son niveau de dangerosité.
- Les itinéraires verts sont les plus sûrs.
- Les itinéraires jaunes indiquent que des événements imprévisibles peuvent se produire lors du saut.
- Les routes orange indiquent une forte probabilité que le vaisseau soit attaqué, même dans le Warp !
- Les itinéraires rouges indiquent que le vaisseau sera à coup sûr attaqué par des forces hostiles lors du trajet.
Le Navigateur du vaisseau peut sécuriser un itinéraire moyennant des points de <b>{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}perspicacité{/g}<b>, qui peuvent être acquis en découvrant et en scannant de nouveaux systèmes dans les Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: Rotanın rengi, barındırdığı tehlike seviyesini gösterir. -Yeşil rotalar tamamen güvenlidir. -Sarı rotalar, sıçrama esnasında öngörülemeyen olayların meydana gelebileceğine işaret eder. -Turuncu rotalar, geminin saldırıya uğrama ihtimalinin yüksek olduğunu gösterir. Öteboyutta bile! -Kırmızı rotalar, geminin yolculuk sırasında düşmanca güçlerin kesinkes saldırısına uğrayacağının göstergesidir. Geminin Rotacı'sı, {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Rotacı içgörüsü{/g} puanı harcayarak bir rotayı daha güvenli hâle getirebilir. Bu puanları, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} boyunca yeni sistemler keşfedip buralarda tarama gerçekleştirerek elde edilebilirsin.
languages.original_text: A route's colour is an indication of its danger level. -Green routes are the absolute safest. -Yellow routes signal that unpredictable events can occur during the jump. -Orange routes denote a high probability of the ship coming under attack — even in the warp! -Red routes are a sure sign that the ship will be assaulted by hostile forces during travel. The ship's Navigator can make a route safer by spending points of {g|Encyclopedia:NavigatorsInsight}Navigator's insight{/g}, which can be acquired by discovering and scanning new systems throughout the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}.
